RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RH QUERIDO RUPERTO popped,duel,best. JT ONE SWEET SHAKEEM dueled, outkicked. BT BLUESMAN best of rest rail. TDZ TIMEKEEPER one paced outside. TARACORONAGIRL lacked bid. AR EAGLE FIRE off bit slow, trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 300 Y Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 12500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EAGLETTE brk out,bmp,drift,held. ZOOM N ON HIGH last away,rally,nod2nd. LEAVIN LOUISIANA dueled early,nipped2nd. BATTY BOY broke out, even late. ROMEO ROGUE no threat rail. JJ STRAKIN EYES bmp brk, drifted out.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 10500. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C C GIRL off and gone. THE SHINING CARTEL chased,drift,2nd best. TRU BLOOD pressed, caught 2nd. DEVELOPMENT one paced outside. COSINO ROGUE broke back, no bid. MARYS WAGON remained back. RALLY ACTRESS last away, traffic.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LQHBA Breeders Derby Trial EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 400 Y Dirt CR: 88. Derby Trial Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS WHO REMAIN ELIGIBLE AND MADE THE FINAL ENTRY PAYMENT TO THE 2023 LQHBA BREEDERS DERBY, OR BY SUPPLEMENTAL NOMINATION. Weight: 126 lbs. $750 due at time of entry. All entry payments must be on account with the horsemen's bookkeeper prior to 10:30 a.m. on the morning of entries. Late supplement at time of entry $15,000 (includes all fees).(*All horse nominated to this race are subject to substance testing (Hair Testing) as outlined by the LQHBA. Refer to www.lqh ba.com or www.evangelinedowns.com).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAN LORENZO JET early bump, took over. WILD TRAIN FORTUNE dueled early,no match. PK PURE ROGUE chased rail. DIAMONDONATRAIN mildly widest. ROYAL JET KNOCKOUT early bump, no bid. BLUE STORM COMIN finished early. TDZ BAMBIS LA CARTEL last away, trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Diamondonatrain
ENTRY.OWNER: J and J Stone Co., Inc.
